name: UrbanSenseAI

//: 'icons' defines a set of icons for the browser to use for the PWA on the home screen, in the app launcher, etc. Different sizes are provided for different contexts.
'start_url' is the preferred URL that should be loaded when the user launches the web application.
'display': 'standalone' makes the web application look and feel like a standalone, native application. It opens in its own window, without any browser UI (like an address bar).
'orientation' defines the default orientation for the web application.
'theme_color' defines the default color for the application's toolbar or address bar.
'background_color' defines a placeholder background color for the application page to display before its stylesheet is loaded.
